snippet.title: Heroes Rise: HeroFall Video Trailer
snippet.description:
Would a hero like you assassinate the president of the United States to defend the right to be Powered? https://www.choiceofgames.com/heroes-rise-3-herofall/redirect.php?src=youtube

"Heroes Rise: HeroFall" completes the epic Heroes Rise trilogy of interactive novels where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

As the corrupt President Victon launches an oppressive campaign of Powered Regulation, you must become a political icon fighting to restore Powered rights in America. What do you stand for as a hero? And what (or whom) will you sacrifice for those ideals?

Will you play as male or female? Gay or straight? Will you team up with Powered villains to save your family? Will America learn to trust you, or fear you?

How high will you rise?
